name:
Doctor Lautrec and the
Forgotten Knights
formal_name:
Doctor Lautrec and the
Forgotten Knights
description:
Enter 19th century Europe and the world of Doctor Jean-Pierre Lautrec. Heâ€™s a brilliant, eccentric, sarcastic professor with few friends but a healthy obsession for solving mysteries. One day, a woman named Marie visits Lautrec bearing a curious gadget. The mysterious map that the gadget displayed seemed to point the way to a fantastic hidden treasure belonging to Louis XIV of the House of Bourbon, a dynasty that had collapsed a century earlier. As they search for the treasure, they find themselves targeted by a mysterious man named Vidocq.

Work as Doctor Lautrec, aided by his perky sidekick Sophie, to unlock the mysteries within and search for the lost treasure of Louis XIV. Search for clues, solve puzzles to unlock new mysteries and gain more information as the quest continues. Immerse yourself in the world of Doctor Lautrec where mystery and adventure can be found around every corner.
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
